title: Genesis Convenient CareNow
description: A faster, more convenient way to see a doctor. Download Genesis Convenient CareNow on your mobile device, giving you on-demand access to a doctor 24/7 with no appointment needed.
descriptionHTML: A faster, more convenient way to see a doctor. Download Genesis Convenient CareNow on your mobile device, giving you on-demand access to a doctor 24/7 with no appointment needed.
summary: A faster, more convenient way to see a doctor.
summaryHTML: A faster, more convenient way to see a doctor.
recentChanges:
We continue to improve the patient experience with these new features:
• Performance enhancements to increase reliability and speed
recentChangesHTML:
We continue to improve the patient experience with these new features:
• Performance enhancements to increase reliability and speed
comments: This was was so much faster than waiting in the office, when its something small. I was done from check in to exit in minutes!
I've used for multiple appointments. Very little, if any, issues.
Very convenient!! Staff is always great!!
Great today. Few problems in past weeks.
Extremely helpful to avoid in-person visits during COVID spike era!

This app doesn't do anything unless you need urgent care or miss your appointment. It did not have my appointments on my calendar. It did not have my surgeon so I could contact him. I uninstalled it waste of memory.
Super Easy to use! This is by far the easiest way to get covid testing done for work or to get minor problems diagnosed like pink eye or something. The Drs are awesome!
Really simple to use

We love our peds dr. We also think its super cool to have this alternative to an actual in office visit via videoconferencing. This pandemic could have seriously been way different without this alternative.

This was an amazing experience. I was really scared to leave the house with all this covid-19 stuff going around and especially to the urgent care since I am comprised. So my call only took about 5 minutes and I had a diagnosis and meds sent to the pharmacy. I am so very thankful for this!
Great app to use if you want to save a trip to an actual doctor's office or clinic. If your symptoms sound serious enough THEN they recommend coming in. :)
Must have a strong signal to use, but very simple and convenient. Would recommend!
Voice cut out a couple times for a few seconds. Internet appeared at full power.
I had good sound and visualization with this app. It is easy to use and effective.
I love this experience. It kept me safe with all the things happening but allowed me to follow up with the health care I needed.

Very professional doctor. Pleased with how she took the time to perform a thorough virtual exam and provided excellent education. A convenient and inexpensive alternative to urgent care for many acute symptoms.
This is the best way to get quick help without getting exposed to other illnesses. Everyone was super nice and helpful.
It's great just doesn't let you go your full length of time for your dr. Appt before it cuts you off
Once setup is done, very easy to use
Makes dr visits easy when working and balancing home life.
Works very nicely and easy to use!
Easy to use and very helpful
So convenient since i dont have a vehicle
Awesome! Really easy & fast!!
Very clear and easy to use
Great way to have a doctor appointment, and so convent.
It was very informative and super helpful !
Easy and comfortable at home instead of dr office
Great. Love practicing recommended social distancing.
Works very well and very easy to use
very helpfull doctor addressed and took care of problem
Convient.. if you dont want to go to am emergency room or doctors office right now.m very friendly dr.
Easy to navigate.
Alot better and safer than seeing a regular doctor in the office
It was fast and easy will definitely use in future
So quick and helpful
My Dr is awesome and I really appreciate him seeing me thru telephone with this whole Cor going on
It was positive
Excellent and fast
Super convinient as i couldnt drive myself to clinic
